descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Mitchell Robinson makes a nice effort as he goes up and blocks Cade Cunningham's shot attempt.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Robinson denies Cunningham of the bucket) 2022/03/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Robinson denies Cunningham of the bucket

videos.description: Marvin Bagley III grabs the reverse layup as the Pistons lead vs. the Knicks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bagley III gets the reverse layup to fall) 2022/03/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bagley III gets the reverse layup to fall

videos.description: Obi Toppin goes soaring as he throws down the reverse slam dunk for the Knicks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Toppin goes soaring for reverse slam) 2022/03/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Toppin goes soaring for reverse slam

videos.description: RJ Barrett gets the and-1 floater to fall as the Knicks lead vs. the Pistons.

videos.headline: Barrett knocks down and-1 floater
